# calcoastpoll

R package to tidy and visualize data from the California Coastal Poll data (Anderson et al, 2012).

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install devtools package if you don't have it already
#install.packages("devtools")

# install calcoastpoll from Github
devtools::install_github("bbest/calcoastpoll")
```

## Usage

See functions listed in the [Reference](./reference/) section and how to use them together in the [Articles](./articles/), so far just [Analyze Poll Data](./articles/analyze.html) also viewable within Rstudio at the console with the command `vignette("analyze")`.
